definition: to eliminate/to do away with/to get rid of
broken/damaged/worn out/lousy/rotten/to break, split or cleave/to get rid of/to destroy/to break with/to defeat/to capture (a city etc)/to expose the truth of
to get rid of/to remove/to exclude/to eliminate/to wipe out/to divide/except/not including

sentences.english: She broke the ice for him.
Keen on Science, away from Superstition, to Raise Populace Quality.
sentences.chinese: 學習科學，破除迷信，提高素質。

sentences.english: History proved that revolution was the violentest storm.
sentences.chinese: 歷史證明，革命是破除迷信最猛烈的風暴。

sentences.english: I was encouraged to break away from old forms and rules.
sentences.chinese: 大家鼓勵我破除舊形式和舊框框。

sentences.english: Individuality, brief luxurious, eradicates the classical serious complicated palace design.
sentences.chinese: 個性，簡約奢華，破除古典厚重繁複的宮廷設計。

sentences.english: This fallacy can also be exploded.
sentences.chinese: 這一條迷信也是能夠完全破除的。

sentences.english: Eradicates the money worship, sets up the correct benefit view.
sentences.chinese: 破除金錢崇拜，樹立正確的利益觀。

sentences.english: Our company will reserve the right to cancel this order or reject the goods for any lingested landing.
sentences.chinese: 本公司保存破除此訂單或圮絕任何延宕的貨物的權益。

sentences.english: It was about breaking away from hypocritical sexual values.
sentences.chinese: 它所是關於破除虛僞性價值觀的電影。

sentences.english: We have to tear down this sick system -- so the sick can live.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須破除這個不良制度，這樣病人才能存活。

sentences.english: Then we have the opportunity to resist them by being examples of happy singles.
sentences.chinese: 接着我們要做一個快樂的光棍，破除這些曲解。

sentences.english: Choose a thought that empowers you in a way that disrupts the disempowering effect of the original negative thought.
sentences.chinese: 選一種能破除原有消極想法造成的影響的新想法。

sentences.english: The point of guru yoga is to break down such discriminations and to see our own nature as Buddha.
sentences.chinese: 上師瑜伽的要點是去破除這樣的分別，並見自性爲佛。

sentences.english: Scientific explanations offer an alternative to superstition.
sentences.chinese: 科學的解釋爲破除迷信提供了一種途徑。

sentences.english: For all the mushrooming demand, there are taboos that have yet to be broken in the country.
sentences.chinese: 對於迅速增長的需求，中國尚未破除這一禁忌。

definition: to break (a bond, constraint etc)/to explain/to unravel/to decipher/to decode/to crack (software)
to cut off/to chop sth in half
(literary) to eliminate/to put an end to
